=== Description

---

++++


<p>Rancher Turtles - Cluster API integration in Rancher.</p>
<p>This release brings a number of bug fixes, dependency bumps and a new feature:</p>
<ul>
<li>Users can now add an annotation cluster-api.cattle.io/cluster-description to a CAPI cluster. Once imported, the annotation value will be shown in the Rancher UI as the description for that cluster.</li>
</ul>
